variables.systemDescription: The Magnavox Odyssey² (known as Philips Videopac G7000 in Europe) was released in 1978. It was unique for its built-in alphanumeric keyboard, designed for educational games and programming, alongside a joystick. It featured a cult library of games that combined traditional board game elements with digital gameplay.

Das Philips Videopac war eine Konsole mit integrierter Tastatur, die 1978 erschien und edukative Spiele bot.
Conocida en Europa como Philips Videopac, esta consola de 1978 incluía un teclado alfanumérico para juegos educativos y programación.
La Videopac se distinguait par son clavier intégré, permettant des jeux éducatifs et de stratégie uniques.
Sistema noto per la sua tastiera integrata e la fusione tra giochi da tavolo e intrattenimento digitale.
